select manpower_sys.tb_employee.id, manpower_sys.tb_employee.name employeeName, manpower_sys.tb_job.name jobName, manpower_sys.tb_job.remark jobRemanrk, manpower_sys.tb_user.loginname adminName, manpower_sys.tb_dept.name deptName from manpower_sys.tb_employee inner join manpower_sys.tb_job on tb_employee.jid = tb_job.id inner join manpower_sys.tb_user on tb_employee.uid = tb_user.id inner join manpower_sys.tb_dept on tb_employee.did = tb_dept.id
and manpower_sys.tb_user.loginname like CONCAT(#{leadName}, '%')
and manpower_sys.tb_dept.name like CONCAT(#{position}, '%')
ORDER BY tb_employee.id asc
select jid from tb_employee where id = #{id}
select tb_job.name jobName, count(tb_job.id) as count from tb_job left join tb_employee on tb_job.id = tb_employee.jid group by tb_job.name
